text: in cold winter days what else can beat a
bowl of hot congee is my ultimate
comfort food whenever I feel under the
weather and also a great remedy to cure
a hangover let's begin to cook congee
you can just you plain rice but a
mixture of plain rice and sticky rice we
make the country thicker so I'm gonna
mix 1/2 a cup of rice we'll have a cup
of sticky rice wash well and then grain
for the fish you can use any kind of
freshwater fish with white flash here I
have one red gram of fish cut into cubes
season with a tablespoon of minced
shallots a tbsp fish sauce some pepper a
teaspoon of chicken stock and a teaspoon
of mint or grated ginger then mix well
and set aside for about 15 minutes now
in a large pot hit about 2 tablespoons
of vegetable oil then fry 2 thinly
sliced shallots until golden brown then
remove the crispy golden shallot into a
small bowl then add the rice to the
fragrant boy in the pot and stir fry
until turn or pick this will make the
country more fragrant and also keeping a
clear broth later and have a teaspoon of
salt and then 2 litres or 8 cups of
water bring to a full boil and skim off
the form then cover the lid and turn off
the heat completely just leave it there
for 30 minutes and the remaining heat
will cook the rice it's a great way to
cook country without having to worry
about burning it it saves a lot of
energy too
now in a separate pan heat some
vegetable and then stir fry the fish
this makes the seasonings of love into
the fish better it's going to be a lot
tastier than adding the fish directly
into the porridge
then cut a piece of ginger into julienne
strips
chop up the spring onion and cilantro to
add more vegetables to the soup you can
you must at least or perilla leaves
roll them up and cut into really thin
threads after 30 minutes just open the
lid and you will see the rice has
bloomed a lot but to you in the shape
the breath is very clear now we can add
the stir fry fish to the soup and then
turn on the heat again and cook for
about 10 to 15 more minute occasionally
give it a good stir so it won't stick to
the bottom of the pot then season to
your taste with some more chicken stock
off its sauce transfer to a serving bowl
sprinkle some chopped spring onion and
cilantro on top a little bit of the
crispy fried shallots some black pepper
and the julienned ginger serve with a
small bowl or playing fish sauce and a
few chilli slices in it to serve you add
a little bit of the vegetables squeeze
in some lime juice and then enjoy the
flavor it deep homey and South fool I
hope you liked the video don't forget to
click like and subscribe to my channel
for more delicious Vietnamese food send
me a photo of your food if you give this
recipe a try by posting on instagram
with hashtag Island recipe thank you for
watching bye bye
